headline.main: U. S. Coast Guard Praised For Fighting in Solomons

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 2 -- Officers and men of the United States Coast Guard played an important combat role in the battle of Solomon Islands, the Navy Department revealed for the first time today.
abstract: US Coast Guard battle role revealed
snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 2 -- Officers and men of the United States Coast Guard played an important combat role in the battle of Solomon Islands, the Navy Department revealed for the first time today....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
